questions.question: What is the dominant color of the packaging's primary design element?

Describing the texture of the packaging, is it smooth or rough?

Is the bag sealed or open at the top?

Are there any prominent nutritional facts displayed?

Is there any visible brand name or logo clearly identifiable?
What is the primary method of information display on the bag?
